request.description:
### CreateObjectOperations Request

This endpoint allows you to create object operations using the specified parameters.

#### Description

This call takes the ID and version of the layout that you want to place the article onto plus the ID of the Dossier AND the InDesign article ID and put an article in the Dossier onto the layout. Note that

#### Request Body

- `jsonrpc` (string): The JSON-RPC version being used.
    
- `method` (string): The method to be executed, in this case, "CreateObjectOperations".
    
- `id` (string): The identifier for the request.
    
- `params` (array): An array containing the parameters for creating object operations, including the ticket, version, and operations.
    

#### Operations

- `Ticket` (string): The current ticket for authentication.
    
- `HaveVersion` (object): Contains the ID, version, and class name of the layout.
    
- `Operations` (array): An array of operations to be performed, including the ID, name, type, and parameters.
    

#### Response

The response will be in JSON format and will include the following schema:

``` json
{
  "id": "",
  "result": {
    "Operations": [
      {
        "Id": "",
        "Name": "",
        "Type": "",
        "Params": [
          {
            "Name": "",
            "Value": 0,
            "__classname__": ""
          }
        ],
        "__classname__": ""
      }
    ],
    "Reports": [],
    "__classname__": ""
  },
  "jsonrpc": ""
}

 ```

The response will contain the ID, name, type, and parameters of the operations performed.

This HTTP POST request is used to create object operations by sending a JSON payload to the specified endpoint. The request body includes parameters such as "jsonrpc", "method", "id", and "params" to specify the ticket, object version, operations, and their respective parameters.

### Request Body

- `jsonrpc` (string): The JSON-RPC version.
    
- `method` (string): The method for creating object operations.
    
- `id` (string): The identifier for the request.
    
- `params` (array): An array containing the ticket, object version, and operations details.
    
    - `Ticket` (string): The current ticket.
        
    - `HaveVersion` (object): Contains the ID, version, and class name of the object version.
        
        - `ID` (string): The object ID of the layout.
            
        - `Version` (string): The object version.
            
        - `__classname__` (string): The class name of the object version.
            
    - `Operations` (array): An array of operations details.
        
        - `Id` (string): The generated GUID for the operation.
            
        - `Name` (string): The name of the operation.
            
        - `Type` (string): The type of the operation, which can be "AutomatedPrintWorkflow" or "ContentStationDigitalEditor".
            
        - `Params` (array): An array of parameters for the operation.
            
            - `Name` (string): The name of the parameter.
                
            - `Value` (string/number): The value of the parameter.
                
            - `__classname__` (string): The class name of the parameter.
                

### Response Body

The response body for this request will contain the result of the object operations creation, including any relevant data or error messages.

### CreateObjectOperations

This endpoint is used to create object operations with the provided parameters.

#### Request

- Method: POST
    
- URL: `{{Studio_Server_URL}}/{{Studio_Server_Directory}}/index.php?protocol=JSON`
    
- Headers:
    
    - Content-Type: application/json
        
- Body:
    
    - { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "CreateObjectOperations", "id": "33", "params": \[ { "Ticket": "{{Current_Ticket}}", "HaveVersion": { "ID": "13129", "Version": "0.56", "__classname__": "ObjectVersion" }, "Operations": \[ { "Id": "10be2025-9e15-4a4d-8af0-899808b9b03b", "Name": "PlaceImage", "Type": "AutomatedPrintWorkflow", "Params": \[ { "Name": "EditionId", "Value": 0, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "ImageId", "Value": 13136, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "SplineId", "Value": 961, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "ContentDx", "Value": 0, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "ContentDy", "Value": 0, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "ScaleX", "Value": 0, "__classname__": "Param" }, { "Name": "ScaleY", "Value": 0, "__classname__": "Param" } \], "__classname__": "ObjectOperation" } \] } \]}
        

#### Response

- Status: 200
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    
- { "type": "object", "properties": { "id": {"type": "string"}, "result": { "type": "object", "properties": { "Operations": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "Id": {"type": "string"}, "Name": {"type": "string"}, "Type": {"type": "string"}, "Params": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "Name": {"type": "string"}, "Value": {"type": "number"}, "__classname__": {"type": "string"} } } }, "__classname__": {"type": "string"} } } }, "Reports": {"type": "array"}, "__classname__": {"type": "string"} } }, "jsonrpc": {"type": "string"} } }

body.raw:
{
    "method": "CreateIssues",
    "id": "1",
    "params": [{
        "Ticket": "{{Admin_Current_Ticket}}",
        "RequestModes": [""],
        "PublicationId": "{{Publication_ID}}",
        "PubChannelId": "1",
        "Issues":[
            {
                "Name": "3rd Issue",
                "Id": null,
                "Description": "The Issue Description",
                "SortOrder": 10,
                "EmailNotify": null,
                "ReversedRead": null,
                "OverrulePublication": null,
                "Deadline": "",
                "ExpectedPages": "16",
                "Subject": "The Issue Subject",
                "Activated": true,
                "PublicationDate": "",
                "ExtraMetaData": [],
                "CalculateDeadlines": false,
                "__classname__": "AdmIssue"
            }
        ],
        "__classname__": "AdmCreateIssuesRequest"
     }],
    "jsonrpc": "2.0"
}

item.name: Webhooks
item.description:
List of available webhooks:  
  
Object event

Created

Creates a new object in the workflow.

Moved to Trash Can

Moves an object from the workflow to the Trash Can.

Deleted

Deletes an object permanently (from the workflow or Trash Can).

Restored

Restores a deleted object from the Trash Can (back into the workflow).

Copied

Creates a new object by copying an existing object.

Saved

Saves a new file version for an object.

Modified

Changes the properties of an object using the Properties dialog.

item.name: Digital Articles
item.description: A series of calls for creating digital articles within Studio.
